page.title: 11Education
page.content: {1927 A decision was made to put in a bath - room in the head teachers house.The school was now called Chudleigh Knighton Church school.After interveiwing Miss H.D.Westerin the manager suggested that they could not accept her application as she was unable to take on the school teachers house. {1950 The gutter was inspected and it was decided to get the repair necessary carried out at an early date.The building of a new school was delayed.Miss Powell head teacher and Mr Hawey (Junior) were asked to provide vegetables for the school. {1975 There were fifty three children on roll and three teachers.The infants are housed in a mobile in the
